version_description:
This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

In this update we have fixed an issue with recording that was causing really bad distortion when run on iOS 8.
Also we have made some other minor tweaks to give better iOS 8 compatibility.

Thanks a lot for your continued support.
The Cinnamon Jelly Team
